channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- SPIET800
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- SPIET800

item.title: CVE-2021-22288|2024-08-03T18:37:18.446Z -- abb -- spiet800
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the ABB SPIET800 and PNI800 module allows an attacker to cause the denial of service or make the module unresponsive.

item.title: CVE-2021-22285|2024-08-03T18:37:18.454Z -- abb -- spiet800
item.description: Improper Handling of Exceptional Conditions, Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability in the ABB SPIET800 and PNI800 module that allows an attacker to cause the denial of service or make the module unresponsive.

item.title: CVE-2021-22286|2024-08-03T18:37:18.505Z -- abb -- spiet800
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the ABB SPIET800 and PNI800 module allows an attacker to cause the denial of service or make the module unresponsive.
